short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: PressOne Africa. Work as a team. Communicate as a team.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
PressOne is a telephone integration that allows you to manage your voice customer interaction. With PressOne, you can make and receive calls directly on your chrome extension. It allows you to take notes(coming soon), and mute and unmute calls while on a call.

You have all your call records, recordings and notes directly on your extension.

Key Features:
Inbound/outbound calls
Access to call logs, recordings and notes 
Access to all recordings
Full call control (e.g. mute, unmute, hang up, etc.)
